heisigStory: Rain that undergoes a change so that it can be swept aside with a broom is snow.
koohiiStory1: SNOW isn´t all that different from RAIN, except it can be removed with a BROOM because it only forms in freezing temperatures.
koohiiStory2: Rain just soaks into the soil. Snow has to be swept away with a broom...　RTK2:　セツ　積雪　せきせつ(pilled up snow).
words:
雪崩(なだれ): avalanche
吹雪(ふぶき): snow storm
雪(ゆき): snow
